name: Webster
description:
You play as Webster, a spider who is a thief, and steal $1,000  from a super hero, Cyber-Man.

Controls:

Moving: Arrow Keys

Jump/Select: Z, Enter, Space

Shoot: C

Credits:

WILD CARD: Getting Rich

Game Engine: Godot Game Engine 3.2.3

Pixel art: Aseprite 1.2.25

SFX: jsfxr
